price: “Kun Sihrii ifa galaadha malee waan biraatii miti” jadhan.
arabic: وَقَالُوٓاْ إِنۡ هَٰذَآ إِلَّا سِحۡرٞ مُّبِينٌ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: waqālū in hādhā illā siḥ'run mubīnun
